com.astamuse.asta4d.data.convertor

Interface DataValueConvertor<S,T>

  • Type Parameters:
    S - source type
    T - target type
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DataValueConvertorTargetTypeConvertable<S,T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    String2Bool, String2Date, String2Enum, String2Int, String2Java8Instant, String2Java8LocalDate, String2Java8LocalDateTime, String2Java8LocalTime, String2Java8YearMonth, String2JodaDateTime, String2JodaLocalDate, String2JodaLocalDateTime, String2JodaLocalTime, String2JodaYearMonth, String2Long

    public interface DataValueConvertor<S,T>
    This interface is used by InjectUtil to convert context data to the appropriate type automatically
    Author:
    e-ryu

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T convert(S obj)
      convert a data from the original type to a certain type

    • Method Detail

      • convert

        T convert(S obj)
   throws UnsupportedValueException
        convert a data from the original type to a certain type
        Parameters:
        obj - the data wanted to be converted
        Returns:
        converted result
        Throws:
        UnsupportedValueException
